snippet: In the Bronx, a $1 million Powerball winner missed the deadline for cashing in the ticket, and other equal prizes remain unclaimed.
abstract: Winner of $1 million Powerball sold in the Bronx misses deadline for cashing ticket, and it expires without anyone stepping forward to claim it; ticket is one of five second-place Powerball tickets worth $1 million each that were purchased in 2013 and have yet to be claimed in New York State; workers in Bronx store that sold winning ticket say many Bronx lottery ticket winners lose opportunities by not checking their tickets.
lead_paragraph: In the Bronx, a $1 million Powerball winner missed the deadline for cashing in the ticket, and other equal prizes remain unclaimed.

headline.main: Time and Luck Run Out as $1 Million Lottery Prize Goes Unclaimed in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Time and Luck Run Out as $1 Million Lottery Prize Goes Unclaimed in the Bronx
